Html:
Hello i am triing to set a new dir where save my excel file.

I have this kind of error. Somebody can help me?

Fatal error: Call to undefined method PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007::setTempDir()

$tempDir = "/Report/FileExcel";

$objWriter->setTempDir($tempDir);

$objWriter->save('test.xls');

 

i hope will help me thanks very much.

C.

If you want to save to some existing directory, it should be possible to do like this:

$objWriter->save('somedir/test.xls');

The setTempDir() method does not have anything to do with where the final Excel file should be saved, and you may have mixed up methods for Excel5 writer and Excel2007 writer.
